message:
SYSTEM: PresntacionMLF-vFinal.pdf: Página 8
Initial and Future Work with the Easy-to-Read Methodology 
State of the Art: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines  
Collection of guidelines (WCAG 2.0 and 2.1) focuses 
on technical aspects of web content accessibility 
WCAG 2.1 guidelines are categorized into four principles 
(perceivable, operable, understandable, robust) 
Each guideline has associated a collection of testable 
success criteria are created 
Based on the set of criteria satisfied by the Web content, a 
particular level of compliance (A, AA or AAA) is assigned to 
such a content 
This collection do not include any guideline related to the 
Easy-To-Read Methodology 
14
speaker: SYSTEM
